title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 820.13 - Standards pertaining to Medicaid reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 820.13 - Standards pertaining to Medicaid reimbursement

State Regulations
(a) Services must be delivered in accordance
with the signed treatment/recovery plan, this Part and Part 841 of this

Title. (b) Non-covered services. Components that are not provided to, or directed exclusively toward the
treatment of the Medicaid beneficiary, are not eligible for Medicaid
reimbursement. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
